command: execute @s[scores={apatoCannonballs=0}] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @p[c=1] {"rawtext":[{"text":"No Cannonballs left in stock!"}]}
execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=0}] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @p[c=1] {"rawtext":[{"text":"No Mortar Shells left in stock!"}]}

execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=!0}, ry=45, rym=-45] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!tamed, type=!player, type=!item, type=!rift:mortar, type=!rift:mortar_shell, type=!rift:egg,  family=!inanimate, c=1, x=~-32, dx=64, y=~-8, dy=64, z=~+16, dz=64] ~ ~ ~ summon rift:mortar_shell ~ ~+30 ~

execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=!0}, ry=135, rym=45] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!tamed, type=!player, type=!item, type=!rift:mortar, type=!rift:mortar_shell, type=!rift:egg,  family=!inanimate, c=1, x=~-16, dx=-64, y=~-8, dy=64, z=~32, dz=-64] ~ ~ ~ summon rift:mortar_shell ~ ~+30 ~

execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=!0}, ry=180, rym=135] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!tamed, type=!player, type=!item, type=!rift:mortar, type=!rift:mortar_shell, type=!rift:egg,  family=!inanimate, c=1, x=~-32, dx=64, y=~-8, dy=64, z=~-16, dz=-64] ~ ~ ~ summon rift:mortar_shell ~ ~+30 ~

execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=!0}, ry=-135, rym=-180] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!tamed, type=!player, type=!item, type=!rift:mortar, type=!rift:mortar_shell, type=!rift:egg,  family=!inanimate, c=1, x=~-32, dx=64, y=~-8, dy=64, z=~-16, dz=-64] ~ ~ ~ summon rift:mortar_shell ~ ~+30 ~

execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=!0}, ry=-45, rym=-135] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!tamed, type=!player, type=!item, type=!rift:mortar, type=!rift:mortar_shell, type=!rift:egg,  family=!inanimate, c=1, x=~16, dx=64, y=~-8, dy=64, z=~-32, dz=64] ~ ~ ~ summon rift:mortar_shell ~ ~+30 ~
execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=0}] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @p[c=1] {"rawtext":[{"text":"No Mortar Shells left in stock!"}]}
execute @s[scores={apatoCatapultBld=0}] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @p[c=1] {"rawtext":[{"text":"No Catapult Boulders left in stock!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Apatosaurus will now assist you in combat"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Apatosaurus will now be neutral"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Apatosaurus will now be aggressive"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your Apatosaurus will now be passive"}]}
execute @s[scores={apatoCannonballs=24}] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @a[c=1] {"rawtext":[{"text":"Maximum amount of cannonballs that can be stored is 24"}]}
execute @s[scores={apatoMortarShell=12}] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @a[c=1] {"rawtext":[{"text":"Maximum amount of mortar shells that can be stored is 12"}]}
execute @s[scores={apatoCatapultBld=24}] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @a[c=1] {"rawtext":[{"text":"Maximum amount of catapult boulders that can be stored is 24"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Tier 3 Creatures cannot be tamed this way, you need to kill them for a chance to get their eggs before taming them!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Treats are for healing and breeding only! Use regular foods to heal adults or speed up growth for babies!"}]}
